name: Level Design Prototyping in GBStudio example project
name_original: Level Design Prototyping in GBStudio example project
description:
This project was created to be an example of creating simple level prototypes in GB Studio. In it are complete art assets for simple scenes and logic for creating dialog-driven quests and scenarios using the engine's default settings.

The game itself can be played in browser, but the .zip file contains the source tileset, Aseprite project, maps, Tiled map files, and GB Studio project.
